verses.esv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.kjv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.
verses.niv: 9 If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just and will forgive us our sins and purify us from all unrighteousness.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God,
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God:
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God--

verses.esv: 2:1 Therefore you have no excuse, O man, every one of you who judges. For in passing judgment on another you condemn yourself, because you, the judge, practice the very same things.
verses.kjv: 1 Therefore thou art inexcusable, O man, whosoever thou art that judgest: for wherein thou judgest another, thou condemnest thyself; for thou that judgest doest the same things.
verses.niv: 1 You, therefore, have no excuse, you who pass judgment on someone else, for at whatever point you judge the other, you are condemning yourself, because you who pass judgment do the same things.

verses.esv: 8 but God shows his love for us in that while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.kjv: 8 But God commendeth his love toward us, in that, while we were yet sinners, Christ died for us.
verses.niv: 8 But God demonstrates his own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

verses.esv: 48 You therefore must be perfect, as your heavenly Father is perfect.
verses.kjv: 48 Be ye therefore perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
verses.niv: 48 Be perfect, therefore, as your heavenly Father is perfect.

verses.esv: 12 No one has ever seen God; if we love one another, God abides in us and his love is perfected in us.
verses.kjv: 12 No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.
verses.niv: 12 No one has ever seen God; but if we love one another, God lives in us and his love is made complete in us.

verses.esv: 8 For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not your own doing; it is the gift of God, 9 not a result of works, so that no one may boast.
verses.kjv: 8 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of yourselves: it is the gift of God: 9 Not of works, lest any man should boast.
verses.niv: 8 For it is by grace you have been saved, through faith--and this not from yourselves, it is the gift of God-- 9 not by works, so that no one can boast.

verses.esv: 15 For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses, but one who in every respect has been tempted as we are, yet without sin.
verses.kjv: 15 For we have not an high priest which cannot be touched with the feeling of our infirmities; but was in all points tempted like as we are, yet without sin.
verses.niv: 15 For we do not have a high priest who is unable to sympathize with our weaknesses, but we have one who has been tempted in every way, just as we are--yet was without sin.

verses.esv: 5 he saved us, not because of works done by us in righteousness, but according to his own mercy, by the washing of regeneration and renewal of the Holy Spirit,
verses.kjv: 5 Not by works of righteousness which we have done, but according to his mercy he saved us, by the washing of regeneration, and renewing of the Holy Ghost;
verses.niv: 5 he saved us, not because of righteous things we had done, but because of his mercy. He saved us through the washing of rebirth and renewal by the Holy Spirit,

verses.esv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,
verses.kjv: 23 For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.niv: 23 for all have sinned and fall short of the glory of God,

verses.esv:
27   So God created man in his own image,
    in the image of God he created him;
    male and female he created them.
verses.kjv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God created he him; male and female created he them.
verses.niv: 27 So God created man in his own image, in the image of God he created him; male and female he created them.

verses.esv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy. I came that they may have life and have it abundantly.
verses.kjv: 10 The thief cometh not, but for to steal, and to kill, and to destroy: I am come that they might have life, and that they might have it more abundantly.
verses.niv: 10 The thief comes only to steal and kill and destroy; I have come that they may have life, and have it to the full.

verses.esv: 2 For we all stumble in many ways. And if anyone does not stumble in what he says, he is a perfect man, able also to bridle his whole body.
verses.kjv: 2 For in many things we offend all. If any man offend not in word, the same is a perfect man, and able also to bridle the whole body.
verses.niv: 2 We all stumble in many ways. If anyone is never at fault in what he says, he is a perfect man, able to keep his whole body in check.

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv:
2   but your iniquities have made a separation
    between you and your God,
  and your sins have hidden his face from you
    so that he does not hear.
verses.kjv: 2 But your iniquities have separated between you and your God, and your sins have hid his face from you, that he will not hear.
verses.niv: 2 But your iniquities have separated you from your God; your sins have hidden his face from you, so that he will not hear.

verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.

verses.esv: 5 For there is one God, and there is one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,
verses.kjv: 5 For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
verses.niv: 5 For there is one God and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus,

verses.esv:
12   There is a way that seems right to a man,
    but its end is the way to death.
verses.kjv: 12 There is a way which seemeth right unto a man, but the end thereof are the ways of death.
verses.niv: 12 There is a way that seems right to a man, but in the end it leads to death.

verses.esv: 12 Not that I have already obtained this or am already perfect, but I press on to make it my own, because Christ Jesus has made me his own.
verses.kjv: 12 Not as though I had already attained, either were already perfect: but I follow after, if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus.
verses.niv: 12 Not that I have already obtained all this, or have already been made perfect, but I press on to take hold of that for which Christ Jesus took hold of me.

verses.esv:
A Song of Ascents.

120:1   In my distress I called to the LORD,
    and he answered me.
verses.kjv: 1 In my distress I cried unto the LORD, and he heard me.
verses.niv: 1 I call on the LORD in my distress, and he answers me.

verses.esv: 20 Surely there is not a righteous man on earth who does good and never sins.
verses.kjv: 20 For there is not a just man upon earth, that doeth good, and sinneth not.
verses.niv: 20 There is not a righteous man on earth who does what is right and never sins.

verses.esv: 37 For nothing will be impossible with God.”
verses.kjv: 37 For with God nothing shall be impossible.
verses.niv: 37 For nothing is impossible with God."

verses.esv: 14 For by a single offering he has perfected for all time those who are being sanctified.
verses.kjv: 14 For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified.
verses.niv: 14 because by one sacrifice he has made perfect forever those who are being made holy.

verses.esv:
6   All we like sheep have gone astray;
    we have turned—every one—to his own way;
  and the LORD has laid on him
    the iniquity of us all.
verses.kjv: 6 All we like sheep have gone astray; we have turned every one to his own way; and the LORD hath laid on him the iniquity of us all.
verses.niv: 6 We all, like sheep, have gone astray, each of us has turned to his own way; and the LORD has laid on him the iniquity of us all.
